name: 李懿軒
objective:
先修課程：負責教授同意。
此為連續兩學期之課程的一部分，包含 (A) 材料試驗、(B) 固力實驗、(C) 熱工實驗、(D) 流力實驗。不分順序，(A)、(B)、(C)、(D) 都需完成。
This is a part of a 2-semester courses in which (A) Materials testing, (B) Solid mechanics testing, (C) Thermal Lab and (D) Fluid Mechanics Lab Experiments are included. Sequence of (A), (B), (C) and (D) may be changed, but all of them have to be completed.

name: 嚴建隆
objective:
本課程之教學目標:
    1. 使學生瞭解材料試驗的目的，各種材料機械性質之意義，材料試驗設備的構 
       造及其使用方法。
    2. 使學生瞭解金相試片之製作過程及各種金屬材料之顯微組織，並熟悉金相拍
       攝及各項操作過程。
Teaching objectives of this course
     1. Let students understand the purpose of material testing, the significance 
         of the mechanical properties of various materials, and the equipment of 
         material testing.The structure of the equipment and how to use it.
     2.Enable students to understand the production process of metallographic 
        specimens and the microstructure of various metal materials, and become 
        familiar with them. Metallographic photography and various operations.
